meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for FreeBSD (vers 25 March 2009), see www.w3.org

div.p: About eight o'clock I went to the office. The chief clerk pretended not to notice my arrival. I for my part also behaved as though he were not in existence. I read through and collated documents. About four o'clock I left. I passed by the director's house, but no one was to be seen. After dinner I lay for a good while on the bed.
